thread.title: After Anirudh Kuralarasan to sing a song in Simbu music for Santhanam Vaibhavi Sakka Podu podu Raja - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: After Anirudh Kuralarasan to sing a song in Simbu music for Santhanam Vaibhavi Sakka Podu podu Raja - Tamil Movie News

title: After Anirudh Kuralarasan to sing a song in Simbu music for Santhanam Vaibhavi Sakka Podu podu Raja - Tamil Movie News
text: Vijay-Simbu-Vijay Sethupathi-Tamannaah's amazing gestures Last week it was confirmed that music director and singer Anirudh Ravichander has crooned a song under multi-talented star Silambarasan's musci for 'Sakka Podu Podu Raja' starring Santhanam and Vaihavi in lead roles. Now we learn that the music album of the film will include a song sung by another young music director. Kuralarasan, the young brother of Simbu and the music director of Simbu-Nayanthara starrer 'Idhu Namma Aalu' will be singing a song composed by his elder brother in 'Sakka Podu Podu Raja'.
